texts.couponenglish: ***Detach Lower Portion and Return with Payment***
texts.couponspanish: ***Separar Parte Inferior y Devolver con el Pago***
texts.serviceenglish: Customer Care is available for assistance.
texts.servicespanish: Atención al Cliente disponible para ayudarle.
texts.bodyenglish: This bill represents charges for your visit at Open Door Family Medical Centers. If you would like to speak to a Customer Service Representative, please call (914) 200-3292.
texts.bodyspanish: Esta factura representa los cargos de su visita a Open Door Family Medical Centers. Si desea hablar con un Representante de Atención al Cliente, por favor llame al (914) 200-3292.
texts.bodyotherenglish: Please let us know if the address on this statement is incorrect or your insurance information has changed by calling (914) 200-3292.
texts.bodyotherspanish: Por favor infórmenos si la dirección en esta factura está incorrecta o si la información de su seguro ha cambiado. Por favor llame al (914) 200-3292.
texts.payment1english:
Pay on-line with a check, debit/credit, and HSA/FSA card
using the below Payment ID
texts.payment1spanish: Pague en línea con un cheque, tarjeta de débito/crédito, y tarjeta HSA/FSA usando la ID de pago siguiente.
texts.payment2english: You may qualify for financial assistance. Visit odfmc.youraccountcenter.com or contact (914) 200-3292 for details.
texts.payment2spanish: Visite odfmc.youraccountcenter.com o llámenos a (914) 200-3292 para detalle.
texts.payment3english:
Please make checks payable to
Open Door Family Medical Centers
texts.payment3spanish:
Por favor hacer cheques a nombre de
Open Door Family Medical Centers
texts.value8english: Customer Care is available for assistance
texts.value8spanish: Atención al Cliente esta disponible para asistencia
